Grigs are kindly musicians of the fey, often getting themselves into trouble due to their penchant for confronting evil well beyond their ability to vanquish. Even so, they fight bravely and with great cunning, using their magic and ranged sonic attacks while flying and leaping using their wings and powerful cricket-like lower torsos to stay out of reach. **[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Grig](/Monsters.aspx?ID=390) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 308 **Perception** +7; low-light vision **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +2, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7 **Str** -2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +1 **Int** +0 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +4 --- **AC** 17 **Fort** +6 **Ref** +9 **Will** +9 **HP** 20 **Weaknesses** cold iron 5 --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** fist +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 1d4–2 bludgeoning **Ranged** dissonant note +9 ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)), **Damage** 1d8 sonic **Primal Innate Spells** DC 18 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132) - **1st** [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) - **2nd** [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only) **Fiddle** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) A grig can rub its legs together to create a catchy fiddling tune that compels others within 30 feet to dance about, with varying effects depending on a DC 18 Will save. A listener is temporarily immune for 10 minutes on a success, but otherwise, if the grig continues to Fiddle each round, the creature receives no additional saves.
**Success** No effect.
**Failure** Flat-footed and –10-foot status penalty to Speeds.
**Critical Failure** As failure, and also slowed 1.
